name.description: The name of the handler (as it is defined in the class)

sites.description: The list of sites that require this handler

items.description: The site where the handler is available

targets.description: The list of the html elements that can be handled

items.description: The name of the html element to be handled

uri.description: The URI of the handler. Used as a fallback if the file is not found

file.description: The file where the handler is defined. Will be used before the URI
